Journey to Un'Goro.name: Adaptation
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Adapt a friendly minion.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Pray for salvation. If that fails, pray for extra horns or bigger teeth.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Air Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Awaken the Makers
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Quest: Summon 7 Deathrattle minions. Reward: Amara, Warden of Hope.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: They keep hitting the Snooze button.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Binding Heal
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Restore #5 Health to a minion and your hero.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: By accepting this healing, you agree to the following terms…

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Crystalline Oracle
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Deathrattle: Copy a card from your opponent's deck _and add it to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Being made of light has its disadvantages, but at least it's always looking on the bright side.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Emerald Hive Queen
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Your minions cost (2) more.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: She rules the emerald hive at the end of the yellow brick trail.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Emerald Reaver
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to each hero.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Not to be confused with clubbing enthusiast Emerald Raver.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Fly
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Add a 1/2 Elemental to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Archnemeses: small children with glass jars.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Plume's Heart
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Play 7 Taunt minions. Reward: Sulfuras.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Why does an active volcano need to be defended? To save its ash.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Flame Geyser
Journey to Un'Goro.text:
Deal $2 damage.
Add a 1/2 Elemental to_your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Oh, a wise geyser eh?

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Glacial Shard
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ice, ice, baby!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Hallucination
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Discover a card from your opponent's class.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's the good kind of hallucination.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Iron Hide
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Gain 5 Armor.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Week 6. I remain covered head to toe with scales. They do not yet realize that I am not a dinosaur.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Jeweled Macaw
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Add a random Beast to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It’s not LITERALLY jeweled. The goblins were terribly disappointed.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Jungle Giants
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Summon 5 minions with 5 or more Attack. Reward: Barnabus.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Forming the Golakka Crater was the end of Barnabus' disastrous career as a dancer.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Discard 6 cards. Reward: Nether Portal.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lost in the Jungle
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Summon two 1/1 Silver Hand Recruits.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: George and Karl were never heard from again.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Molten Blade
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a new weapon.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It’s a sword! It’s a knife! It’s a swizzle-stick!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Open the Waygate
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Cast 8 spells that didn't start in your deck. Reward: Time Warp.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Although powerful, the incantation is simple. It’s just a jump to the left, and then a step to the right.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Raptor Hatchling
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Shuffle a 4/3 Raptor into your deck.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: They’re just baby teeth. Lots and lots of baby teeth.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stampede
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Each time you play a Beast this turn, add_a_random Beast to_your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Many hunters long for the pitter-patter of enormous feet.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: The Caverns Below
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Play four minions with the same name. Reward: Crystal Core.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Why can't it ever be The Taverns Below?

Journey to Un'Goro.name: The Last Kaleidosaur
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Quest: Cast 6 spells on your minions. Reward: Galvadon.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: “Impossible!” exclaimed the Silver Hand Recruit, his eyes filled with fear. Uther shook his head, turning the crystal until it caught the light: “Life finds a way.”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: The Marsh Queen
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Play seven 1-Cost minions. Reward: Queen Carnassa.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Question: What's scarier, one giant angry dinosaur or 15 smaller vicious ones? Answer: AHHHHHHH THEY FOUND MEEEEEE

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Unite the Murlocs
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Quest: Summon 10 Murlocs. Reward: Megafin.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Arcanologist
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Biteweed
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Combo: Gain +1/+1 for each other card you've played this turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: AKA Edwin VanLeaf.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Clutchmother Zavas
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Cornered Sentry
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt. Battlecry: Summon three 1/1 Raptors for your_opponent.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The Draenei are seriously considering cancelling "Bring Your Murderous Pet to Work Day."

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Corrupting Mist
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Curse all minions. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Crackling Razormaw
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Adapt a friendly_Beast.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Wasn't clever enough to go AROUND the electric fence.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Dinomancy
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Your Hero Power becomes 'Give a Beast +2/+2.'
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Anyone can dinomance. Just put your lips together and RAAWWWAARGGGH.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Earthen Scales
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: You can make your own Earthen Scales at home. Step 1: Roll around in the dirt. Step 2: Magic.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Explore Un'Goro
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Replace your deck with_copies of "Discover a card."
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It turns out cards DO grow on trees!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Plume Harbinger
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand_by (1).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Golakka Crawler
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Pirate and gain +1/+1.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Universally adored by both control decks and ninjas.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Grievous Bite
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and $1 damage to adjacent ones.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ooh.  I'll have a bite of this, and of this, and of this...

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Hydrologist
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Discover a Secret.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Murloc hydrologists are pretty rare.  Most murloc undergrads pick computer science.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primalfin Champion
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Deathrattle: Return any spells you cast on this minion to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Sure, he'll return your stuff.  OVER HIS DEAD BODY!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primalfin Totem
Journey to Un'Goro.text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primordial Glyph
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Discover a spell. Reduce its Cost by (2).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's the Ancient Tol'vir symbol for "Whoops!"

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Pyros
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Return this to_your hand as a 6/6 that costs (6).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: If you strike her down, she shall become more powerful than you can possibly… well, she'll become a 6/6 anyways.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Radiant Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Your spells cost (1) less.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's a literal lava lamp!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Ravasaur Runt
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Doesn't like to adapt unless others are watching. Some minions are such show-offs.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Razorpetal Lasher
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a Razorpetal to your hand that deals 1 damage.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The reason why there are no zombies in Un'goro.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Razorpetal Volley
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Add two Razorpetals to_your hand that deal_1 damage.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The result of a fundamental misunderstanding of the phrase "flower power".

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Rockpool Hunter
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Murloc +1/+1.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Loves crab meat. Fears crabs.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Shadow Visions
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Discover a copy of a spell in your deck.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: This one’s a bird. And here’s a bunny!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Shimmering Tempest
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: HATES being summoned for Kirin Tor party lighting.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stubborn Gastropod
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Poisonous
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Stubbornly pursuing its dream to become Azeroth's fastest animal!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tortollan Forager
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Add a random minion with 5 or more Attack to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: In the Tortollan tongue, Un’goro is known as the “Land of the Lost and Found.”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Volatile Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Currently in an anger management class with Raging Worgen, Grommash Hellscream, and The Angry Chicken. It isn't helping.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Chittering Tunneler
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Curious Glimmerroot
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: Look at 3 cards. Guess which one started in your opponent's deck to get a copy of it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: George promised to be good. But it's easy for little Glimmerroots to forget.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Devilsaur Egg
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 5/5 Devilsaur.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: A key ingredient in all discerning Funnel Cake recipes.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Eggnapper
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Summon two 1/1 Raptors.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Often misunderstood, it's just that he likes to use the eggs as pillows.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Elder Longneck
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a minion with 5 or more Attack, Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: And so the bartender says, “Why the long neck?”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Envenom Weapon
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Give your weapon Poisonous.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Like Deadly Poison, but deadlier.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Giant Wasp
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Stealth Poisonous
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Float like a butterfly, sting like a giant wasp!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Gluttonous Ooze
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and gain Armor equal to its Attack.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Three time winner of the Un'Goro weapon eating contest.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Hot Spring Guardian
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Battlecry: Restore #3_Health.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Humongous Razorleaf
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Can't attack.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Loves goblins.  In a light cream sauce.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Igneous Elemental
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Add two 1/2 Elementals to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: We wanted to name him "Ingenious Elemental", but he just wasn't that bright.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Mana Bind
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, add a copy to your hand that costs (0).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Nice spell.  YOINK!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Mimic Pod
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Draw a card, then add a copy of it to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Jinx!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Mirage Caller
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a 1/1 copy of it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Mirage is actually the name of its long-lost cat.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primalfin Lookout
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, Discover a_Murloc.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Lookout is a self-appointed title that's mostly an excuse to beat things up.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Pterrordax Hatchling
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Aww.  So cute.  Want to feed him another finger?

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Spirit Echo
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return _this to your hand."
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stonehill Defender
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Battlecry: Discover a Taunt_minion.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Briefly tried stand-up comedy under the name "Stonehill Offender", but turtles are just too thin-skinned.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tar Creeper
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Terrorscale Stalker
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Trigger a friendly minion's Deathrattle.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Likes to scare his friends half to death.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Thunder Lizard
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: What? THUNDER LIZARD is adapting!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tidal Surge
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Lifesteal Deal $4 damage to a_minion.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Vicious Fledgling
Journey to Un'Goro.text: After this minion attacks a_hero, Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: A youngster who is truly hungry for self-improvement.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Bloodbloom
Journey to Un'Goro.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Bright-Eyed Scout
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Change its Cost to (5).
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Also inordinately excited for cupcakes.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Evolving Spores
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Adapt your minions.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The most powerful mushrooms are commonly found in boxes marked with "?".

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Fire Plume Phoenix
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: This is what happens when you use a volcano as a bird bath.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Gentle Megasaur
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Adapt your_Murlocs.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: "Low, low rents! Must enjoy a nomadic lifestyle. Quasi-sentient, bipedal, amphibious humanoids ONLY!"

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lakkari Felhound
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Battlecry: Discard your two lowest-Cost cards.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lightfused Stegodon
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Adapt your Silver_Hand Recruits.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: “Come now, Johnston. I think those horns are quite fetching on you.”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Molten Reflection
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Choose a friendly minion. Summon a copy of it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Dang, I'm looking pretty hot!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Obsidian Shard
Journey to Un'Goro.text:
[x]Costs (1) less for each
card you've played from
another class.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: You know you’re a Rogue when a sharp rock makes you go “Ooh!  Dagger!”

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Ravenous Pterrordax
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt_twice.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Shellshifter
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Master of the Three Shell Monte.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Sherazin, Corpse Flower
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Go Dormant. Play 4 cards in a turn to revive this minion.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: A Tortollan gardener's worst nightmare.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Spiritsinger Umbra
Journey to Un'Goro.text: After you summon a minion, trigger its Deathrattle effect.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: She sees the fate of anyone she meets, but it's always the same: dinosaur attack.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Steam Surger
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, add a 'Flame Geyser' to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Explorers nicknamed him the Teapot Elemental.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stegodon
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Level 40 Tortollan Paladins quest to tame a Stegodon.  There are no level 41 Tortollan Paladins.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: The Voraxx
Journey to Un'Goro.text:
[x]After you cast a spell on
this minion, summon a
1/1 Plant and cast
another copy on it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: I am the Voraxx.  I speak for the weeds.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tol'vir Stoneshaper
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain _Taunt and Divine_Shield.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: He spends a lot of time keeping himself in stoneshape.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tortollan Shellraiser
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random _friendly minion +1/+1.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: A hero... In a half-shell.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Bittertide Hydra
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, deal 3 damage to_your hero.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's actually only the middle head that's bitter. The others are sweet and spicy.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Direhorn Hatchling
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Deathrattle: Shuffle a 6/9 Direhorn with Taunt into your deck.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: His mom could beat up your mom.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Elise the Trailblazer
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Shuffle a sealed_Un'Goro pack into_your deck.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Reno taught her that blazing her own trail is a lot more fun than following someone else's map.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Feeding Time
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Living Mana
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Transform your Mana Crystals into 2/2 Treants. Recover the mana when they die.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: If you truly love your mana, set it free.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Lyra the Sunshard
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Whenever you cast a spell, add a random Priest spell to your hand.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Arise, fair sun, and kill my envious foes. They don't have a legendary as beautiful as you.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Nesting Roc
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you control at_least 2 other minions, gain Taunt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Roc eggs are great in omelettes, sandwiches, and as bait to turn poachers into bird food.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Servant of Kalimos
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, _Discover an Elemental.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: He's doing his best, but his mom thinks that if he had just applied himself in school Kalimos would be working for HIM.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Sudden Genesis
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Summon copies of your damaged minions.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Being hurt can make you another person.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tar Lurker
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Has +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tol'vir Warden
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Draw two 1-Cost minions from your deck.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ferocious in combat… and even more terrifying in pet battles.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Verdant Longneck
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Always sticking its neck into other people’s business.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Vilespine Slayer
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Combo: Destroy a minion.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: 'Cause slayers gonna slay, slay, slay, slay, slay.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Volcano
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deal $15 damage randomly split among all_minions. Overload: (2)
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Cruel Dinomancer
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a random minion you discarded this game.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Frozen Crusher
Journey to Un'Goro.text: After this minion attacks, Freeze it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Goes by the online handle "KoolKrusher99."

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Hemet, Jungle Hunter
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Destroy all cards in your deck that cost (3)_or less.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: The goblin travel agency lost his luggage, but he's still having a great vacation!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Meteor
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deal $15 damage to a minion and $3 damage to adjacent ones.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: When you absolutely, positively have to kill all the dinosaurs.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Ornery Direhorn
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Battlecry: Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: "It's an herbivore.  How dangerous can it be?"  - Famous last words

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Sabretooth Stalker
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Stealth
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: It's gotten a bit long in the tooth.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Spikeridged Steed
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Give a minion +2/+6 and Taunt. When it dies, summon a Stegodon.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: What beats cavalry? Dinosaur cavalry.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Sunkeeper Tarim
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Battlecry: Set all other minions' Attack and Health to 3.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Ironically, his favorite number is 4.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Blazecaller
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you played an_Elemental last turn, deal 5 damage.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: For when a flamecaller just won't do.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Giant Anaconda
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Summon a minion from your hand with 5 or more Attack.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Must be something it ate.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Sated Threshadon
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Deathrattle: Summon three 1/1 Murlocs.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Bet you can't eat just one murloc!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stone Sentinel
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: He and his friends just want to rock out.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Stormwatcher
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Windfury
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Aspiring meteorologist!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Swamp King Dred
Journey to Un'Goro.text: After your opponent plays a minion, attack_it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Swamp King Dred, more like Swamp King Dead, amiright?

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tar Lord
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt Has +4 Attack during your opponent’s turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Tar Lord, man... legendary monster? Aw, forget it.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Vinecleaver
Journey to Un'Goro.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
summon two 1/1 Silver
Hand Recruits.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: George and Karl!  Thank the Light we found you!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Volcanosaur
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Adapt, then_Adapt.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Always fun to say out loud "VOL-CA-NO-SAUUUR!"

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Charged Devilsaur
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Charge Battlecry: Can't attack heroes this turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: What happens when a dinosaur mixes soda and pop rocks.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Dinosize
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Set a minion's Attack and Health to 10.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Comes with fries and a drink.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Free From Amber
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Discover a minion that costs (8) or more. Summon it.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Bingo! Minion DNA!

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, cast an Elemental Invocation.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: All that's missing is a little heart.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Primordial Drake
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all other minions.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Before he became a rap artist.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tortollan Primalist
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell_and cast it with random targets.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: I see pizza in my future.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Giant Mastodon
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Taunt
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Still salty about it not being the "Year of the Mastodon."

Journey to Un'Goro.name: King Mosh
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Battlecry: Destroy all damaged minions.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: He's a terror at concerts.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Ozruk
Journey to Un'Goro.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +5 Health for each Elemental you played last turn.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Between you and me, Ozruk is a bit obsessed with his body.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Tyrantus
Journey to Un'Goro.text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Millennia of evolutionary pressures turned his species into the Faerie Dragons we know today.

Journey to Un'Goro.name: Ultrasaur
Journey to Un'Goro.flavor: Evolved the really long neck to spy on its neighbors.
